name: piwigo-bootstrap-darkroom
description: A Piwigo theme based on Bootstrap 4
author: Thomas Kuther

scripts.build-windows: npm-run-all build:bootstrap build:bootstrap-darkroom build:theme build:material:windows build:bootswatch:windows
scripts.build-linux: npm-run-all build:bootstrap build:bootstrap-darkroom build:theme build:material:linux build:bootswatch:linux
scripts.build:bootstrap: npm run build:bootstrap:sass && npm run build:bootstrap:postcss
scripts.build:bootstrap-darkroom: npm run build:bootstrap-darkroom:sass && npm run build:bootstrap-darkroom:postcss
scripts.build:material:windows:sass: for %i in (amber blue brown darkroom deep-orange deep-purple indigo light-green lime purple red teal) do (sass --quiet scss/material/_%i.scss css/material-%i/bootstrap.css || exit /b 1)
scripts.build:material:windows:postcss: for %i in (amber blue brown darkroom deep-orange deep-purple indigo light-green lime purple red teal) do (postcss --config postcss.config.js --replace css/material-%i/bootstrap.css || exit /b 1)
scripts.build:material:windows: npm run build:material:windows:sass && npm run build:material:windows:postcss
scripts.build:material:linux:sass: for i in amber blue brown darkroom deep-orange deep-purple indigo light-green lime purple red teal; do sass --quiet scss/material/_${i}.scss css/material-${i}/bootstrap.css || exit 1; done
scripts.build:material:linux:postcss: for i in amber blue brown darkroom deep-orange deep-purple indigo light-green lime purple red teal; do postcss --config postcss.config.js --replace css/material-${i}/bootstrap.css || exit 1; done
scripts.build:material:linux: npm run build:material:linux:sass && npm run build:material:linux:postcss
scripts.build:bootswatch:windows:sass: for %i in (cerulean cosmo cyborg darkly flatly journal litera lumen lux materia minty pulse sandstone simplex sketchy slate solar spacelab superhero united yeti) do (sass --quiet scss/bootswatch/_%i.scss css/bootswatch-%i/bootstrap.css || exit /b 1)
scripts.build:bootswatch:windows:postcss: for %i in (cerulean cosmo cyborg darkly flatly journal litera lumen lux materia minty pulse sandstone simplex sketchy slate solar spacelab superhero united yeti) do (postcss --config postcss.config.js --replace css/bootswatch-%i/bootstrap.css || exit /b 1)
scripts.build:bootswatch:windows: npm run build:bootswatch:windows:sass && npm run build:bootswatch:windows:postcss
scripts.build:bootswatch:linux:sass: for i in cerulean cosmo cyborg darkly flatly journal litera lumen lux materia minty pulse sandstone simplex sketchy slate solar spacelab superhero united yeti; do sass --quiet scss/bootswatch/_${i}.scss css/bootswatch-${i}/bootstrap.css || exit 1; done
scripts.build:bootswatch:linux:postcss: for i in cerulean cosmo cyborg darkly flatly journal litera lumen lux materia minty pulse sandstone simplex sketchy slate solar spacelab superhero united yeti; do postcss --config postcss.config.js --replace css/bootswatch-${i}/bootstrap.css || exit 1; done
scripts.build:bootswatch:linux: npm run build:bootswatch:linux:sass && npm run build:bootswatch:linux:postcss
scripts.build:custom: npm run build:custom:sass && npm run build:custom:postcss
